custom-action.name: java
custom-action.description:
Launches a Java program on the Load Generator machine. Jars and resources copied under the 'custom-resources' folder of the project are automatically copied to all Load Generators. Use the variable '${NL-CustomResources}' to access the synchronized folder on the Load Generator.
Possible parameters are: - JRE: The path to the Java Runtime Environment executable on the Load Generator - argX: Java argument number X (eg: arg1, arg2, ...) - charset: The charset used by the console. Default platform charset is used if not set.
